DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant Interviewer Administered Questionnaire Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Related to interviewer administered questionnaire eligibility criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Property.preferredName: Interviewer Administered Questionnaire Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The person who manages an interview and asks the questions.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).:A predetermined set of questions.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The person who manages an interview and asks the questions.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF1804
ReferenceDocuments.description: Agrees to have the interview taped, transcribed and qualitatively analyzed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Agrees to participate in a co
ReferenceDocuments.description: Agrees to participate in a confidential 1-on-1 semi-structured interview with the research team.

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF1805CD
ReferenceDocuments.description: Agrees to complete one brief, confidential telephone interview, conducted by the Memorial Sloan Kettering (MSK) research associate, which will be taped, transcribed and qualitatively analyzed.
